speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Jessica?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Jessica. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Could you please verify your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. I see here that you have a balance of $450 due. When do you plan to make a payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I didn't know I had a balance. Can you provide more details?

speaker: Agent
text: Sure! This balance is from services rendered last month. Can I assist you with the payment plan?

speaker: Customer
text: I need to check my finances first before committing.

speaker: Agent
text: Of course, take your time. Just to confirm, do you want to set a follow-up call next week?

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, I will call you next Wednesday. Thank you for your time, Jessica.
